content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on handling incomplete ITFs, including
handling an incomplete
VA Form 21-0966
prior to receipt of a subsequent claim
acknowledging receipt of an incomplete
VA Form 21-0966
, and
handling an incomplete
VA Form 21-0966
after receipt of a subsequent claim
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Intent to File (ITF)
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
